title: Transformers: 40th Anniversary Event
synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given a chance to have his criminal history erased if he can successfully implant an idea into a target's subconscious.

title: Transformers One
synopsis: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
synopsis: Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll: he has burned through eight of his nine lives. Puss sets off on an epic journey to find the mythical Last Wish and restore his nine lives.
